homepage.title: Homepage – Innoledge
homepage.metaDescription: Marketing Sourcing Investment Regulatory Affairs Business Consultancy Distribution OUR COMPANY INNOLEDGE INTERNATIONAL LTD. is a multicultural network of professionals with over 30 years of experience in trade and investments in Asia, with special emphasis on Health, Cosmetics and Agro-Food business.

company.name: INNOLEDGE INTERNATIONAL LTD.
company.description: is a multicultural network of professionals with over 30 years of experience in trade and investments in Asia, with special emphasis on Health, Cosmetics and Agro-Food business.
company.valueProposition: Lock into the INNOLEDGE INTERNATIONAL network and you are assured instant access to market surveys and analyses. Undertaking communication-planning with customers and opinion leaders, and lobbying to influence decision makers at various levels are both part of the merit of the multicultural and multi-discipline INNOLEDGE INTERNATIONAL team.
company.marketInsight: Because of the fast development of Asian markets and particularly China, the region is becoming the largest economy of the world. For any business development with Asia is a top priority.
company.offices: Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai and Tokyo
company.cta: INNOLEDGE INTERNATIONAL is the right partner for your development with Asia.
